Bachelor of Technology - Computer Information Systems, GPA 3.78, June 2024  
Dean’s List (8x), National Honor Society  

## PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

**Amazon Web Services (AWS)** | Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed AWS architectures for enterprise clients, enhancing scalability and security.  
- Developed POCs integrating Generative AI and analytics, delivering actionable insights.  
- Automated sentiment analysis pipeline processing 1M+ records, achieving 5x faster feedback.  
- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by 5% and reducing toxicity by 8%.  

### Software Developer Intern

Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Designed Virtual Credential System for decentralized identity, enhancing security.  
- Configured Azure environments for application deployment, ensuring compliance.  

### IT Support Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services** | New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows, reducing manual workload significantly.  
- Supported secure access for VIP users, enhancing operational security.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U)** | Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons to 200+ learners, achieving a 96% graduation rate.

- Developed a job search assistant using FastAPI and OpenAI GPT-4.1, automating applications.  
- Reduced application time by 60% and increased weekly applications by 300%.
